}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "141852220030J R0A2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos, as well as at least one retail unit. {{see also|LG AN-WF100|Arcadyan}} {{WiFiCert|WFA50763|10/23/2013}}
=== Compatible Models === The AN-WF500 can be used on any of the following LG TV model: * LED LCD: LX, LEX, LE8, LE7, LE59, LE58, LE56, LE55, LE54 Series * PDP: LB49, LB57, LB58, LB61 and PB660 Series * Display: 98LS95A, LS75A and SE3B : LG AN-MR500 - Magic Remote Control (BT remote)
*Compatible for Select 2014 LG TV: :LB5800, LB6100, LB6190, PB6600, LF6100, LF6090, LF5800 series *Wireless Sound Sync Audio Products: :NB5540, NB4530, NB3530, NB3520, LAP34X, ND8630, ND5630
[[Category:English Documentation]]
